etymology.interpretation: Depicts a stylized polearm with a blade and shaft. Early forms resemble an actual weapon, which was later regularized into the compact modern strokes.

examples.chinese: 公历2018年是戊戌年(公曆2018年是戊戌年)。
examples.pinyin: Gōnglì èr líng yī bā nián shì Wùxū nián.
examples.english: The year 2018 in the Gregorian calendar was the Wuxu year.

examples.chinese: “戊”是天干的第五位(「戊」是天干的第五位)。
examples.pinyin: “Wù” shì tiāngān de dì wǔ wèi.
examples.english: “Wù” is the fifth of the Heavenly Stems.

examples.chinese: 古文中“戊”也象形为戈矛之兵器(古文中「戊」也象形為戈矛之兵器)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔwén zhōng “Wù” yě xiàngxíng wéi gēmáo zhī bīngqì.
examples.english: In classical texts, “wù” also pictographically represents a halberd-like weapon.
